message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $10,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $10,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $7,500 is quite a bit below my asking price. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $9,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $8,200. Can you consider that?
